img_text: ○ ▼M 80% 10:05 Daniel Thomas Overheard at Heriot-Watt. 37 minutes ago . SOMEONE SHAT ON MY CAR AGAIN! PLEASE CONTAIN YOURSELF I don't know who raised you but cars are for driving not shitting upon. If you have a problem I'm sure we can chat about it. If you know the culprit please tag them
